programme.title: NORAID and the Harrods bombing
programme.short_synopsis: The Irish Northern Aid Committee and the 1983 bombing of Harrods by the Provisional IRA.
programme.medium_synopsis: The American contributions to NORAID, a fund set up to fund arms and provide financial assistance to IRA members in jail, and the aftermath of the Harrods bombing.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
